title: Today, Jan 4th
content:
[{"type":"p","children":[{"text":"Deeply saddened by the poor support, documentation, and broken smart contracts on PenX. 
"}],"id":"81f29c5b-1e9d-4086-b3b2-163e2bb5a990"},{"type":"p","id":"156e262a-3968-4b33-8b44-e8e324c0b5ff","children":[{"text":"I love the sleek look. The simple UI.  The Membership settings. The $EXOTERIC token!"}]},{"type":"p","id":"2b6e53ef-709f-455b-9037-f3bd92bce916","children":[{"text":"
Hey aren’t enough to keep me here, though. If the issues with $PEN and tipping aren’t fixed immediately, I won’t waste time here."}]},{"type":"p","id":"77e2fb2f-bda6-478b-972e-92d7f72399b9","children":[{"text":"
- Jack"}]}]
